title: Katy Perry’s New Platinum Hair Could Mean Big Changes Ahead
text: February 7, 2017 Getty Images Katy Perry just made a major change, and you’re gonna want to see it. Elephant in the room: We always say that. But in this case it’s warranted, because the color chameleon celeb is tapping into the undercurrents on this one, channeling a trend that’s slowly but surely taking over everywhere. We’d be obsessing over Katy Perry’s new platinum hair in any old paparazzi shot, but her release of this new dye job is especially significant, potentially signaling a change in her celeb persona. We’re used to Perry as Muppet-wearing, do-what-you-want style icon , and love her for it — but with her transformative new platinum shrouded in millennial pink, who knows what’s coming next. You May Also Like Hair The 11 Most Flattering Haircuts for Women in Their 40s Judging by her fuzzy wool coat, the Muppet love won’t be gone entirely. But her caption, “New life who dis,” has us wondering—in adopting the pink of literally most things around us ( Glossier ! Athleisure ! Cover FX Custom Enhancer Drops !), is Perry making a break for a more mainstream-chic persona? The distinctive pink is popular for “altering society’s understanding of femininity,” according to some . Loading View on Instagram And given Perry’s full-frontal gaze at the camera, it seems she's aware of this cultural implication. Eye contact signals #owningit in art history, breaking passivity and transforming the object to subject—and by harnessing the transformative power of platinum, we’re betting, Perry’s doing just that. While the soft-focus Marilyn Monroe–style shot could just be another flash in the pan, if Perry’s putting down what we’re picking up, she’s turning the tables on pink, pussy bows, and her persona, as a woman about to take back the reins.
